components.description: A medium-sized square shaded completely black. Smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square and larger than the ◾ Black Medium-Small Square and the ▪️ Black Small Square.
components.title: Black Medium Square

description: A medium-sized square shaded completely black. Smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square and larger than the ◾ Black Medium-Small Square and the ▪️ Black Small Square.
title: Black Medium Square

version.description:
The following characters we added to Unicode in 2002, with many given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

Those given emoji presentation status by Unicode were part of Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: Black Medium Square was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/black-medium-square/
emoji_net_data.name: black medium square

bn:00111084a: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

bn:00065099n: A town square is an open public space commonly found in the heart of a traditional town used for community gatherings.
An open area in a town, sometimes including the surrounding buildings.
An open space in a town, not necessarily square in shape, often containing trees, seating and other features pleasing to the eye.
An open area at the meeting of two or more streets
An open area commonly found in the heart of a traditional town, used for community gatherings.
An open area in a town.
An open area commonly found in the heart of a traditional town used for community gatherings
